nodes.text: The long-barreled blaster was among the blaster weapons wielded by Rebel troopers at the Battle of Hoth.

Nothing is known about this blaster model from The Empire Strikes Back. It does not visually match a Merr-Sonn Mark II or Blastech Light Repeating Blaster. The long-barreled blaster shows up a few times in the Battle of Hoth scenes.
